1.title: Bringing Home the Bacon
1.plot: Jerry leads the family on a nighttime eradication hunt in pig-plagued Texas. While the Miculeks try to bring home the bacon, Jess and Logan find hidden treasures in forgotten guns as they clean up the shop.

2.title: Ladies Self-Defense & Tommy's Revolver
2.plot: Kay and Lena teach a group of novice women the basics of self-defense weaponry, but are the ladies ready for the targo-bot? And cousin Tommy, the veteran pistolsmith, schools Logan on the lost art of the custom revolver.

3.title: Shifting Gears
3.plot: Lena knows her way around a pistol grip but she's never tackled a stick shift. Will Jerry be a proficient instructor or just drive his student-driver crazy? Back at the shop, Jess takes on a special project for brother Logan.

4.title: Cajun Games
4.plot: With South Louisiana flooded, Jerry's little brother and a few old shooting buddies head for high ground on Shootout Lane, where Jerry and Kay have created a Cajun-themed shooting competition.

5.title: Shootout Lane Night Match
5.plot: When a night match gets canceled, the family creates its own moonlight competition. Cousins Aaron and Ben scramble to build a custom pistol for this impromptu family shootout. Will they light it up or will it be lights out?

6.title: Cowboy Action
6.plot: Cowboy 3-gun master T-Bone Dooley joins the Miculek's for an action-packed shooting lesson, but when Lena finds herself in hot water, can she win her first-ever duel in the sun?

7.title: Viking Axe & the Meltdown
7.plot: Lena wants to make some battle-axe themed furniture, but does she underestimate the amount of work involved? Over at the shop, Jess and Logan undertake a Damascus meltdown pistol for an old family friend.

8.title: Jerry's World Record Inception
8.plot: Jerry is long overdue for a new world record. In preparation for this feat, he enlists the help of Lena, who might just steal his thunder with her own attempt.

9.title: Jerry & Lena Attempt World Records
9.plot: The family heads to Las Vegas, where Jerry once again intends to ink his name in the world record book, but will Lena be prepared for her record debut?

1.title: Nature Calls & The Girlie Gun
1.plot: Jerry gets the kids up at dawn to relive his youth, demonstrate underwater ballistics and turtle fishing while Kay gives Jim one day to build a "girlie" gun for her granddaughter.

2.title: The 1,000 Yard Shot & Gun Art
2.plot: Jerry takes on the impossible task of a 1,000 yard pistol shot, pulling Jim into an epic and unprecedented custom build while the girls take on decorating Kay's bare walls with gun art.

3.title: Get Prepared & Commemoration
3.plot: Kay and Jim build a commemorative custom pistol to honor their legendary father while Jerry gets Lena prepared for any emergency through tire shopping and bug out bag building.

4.title: Hot-Rodding a Pistol & Hoarding
4.plot: Lena pulls her Uncle Jim into a hot-rodding project on her competition pistol while Kay tries to get Jerry to undo decades of hoarding by cleaning up his shop.

5.title: Custom Double Rifle & Zombies
5.plot: While Jerry and the kids take on Zombies, Jim proves all custom double guns don't have to come from England when he builds a Safari worthy rifle in his Louisiana shop.

6.title: Gone RV'ing & a Custom AR
6.plot: Jerry, Lena, and Kay pile into the RV for a road trip but things don't go according to plan when the motor-home breaks down while back home Jim and his son build a rifle for competition.

1.title: Jerry Goes Home
1.plot: A Gatling Gun delivery is the perfect excuse for Jerry to go back to his swamp roots and take the family along for the ride, frogging, plinking, and testing the Gatling included.

2.title: Lena is a Babe in the Woods
2.plot: While Jerry and Jim build the lightest possible modern sporting rifle for charity, Lena's complaint about never having gone camping results in an outdoor adventure for the girls.

3.title: Jerry Does Yoga
3.plot: Lena exposes Jerry's lack of flexibility and agility on the range so a trip to the Yoga studio results in some rather unusual shooting positions while Kay and Jim dig out Dad's old guns.

4.title: Miculek Family Knife Fight
4.plot: Jerry's concern over the girl's safety leads to a combat knife class with blade master Mike Janich while Brock builds a functional iconic movie blaster from a Broom Handle Mauser.

5.title: Jerry Gets Terminated
5.plot: Another movie tribute puts Jerry on the spot to pull off a tricky shotgun maneuver while Kay puts Clark Custom Guns to the test with a high-power pig pistol build.

6.title: Clark Brotherly Love
6.plot: Jim's sons take a more active role at Clark Custom Guns but head to head competition takes precedence over shop work while Jerry takes the girls on an upland hunting adventure.

7.title: Kay Puts on a Dress
7.plot: While Jerry takes care of the chores and maintains his mastery of guns, Kay has to play dress up against her will for the upcoming shotgun championships in Italy.

8.title: Lena Tries to Survive
8.plot: Jerry, Lena, and Kay embark on a survival course complete with fried grubs while Brock spends a day at home in fan-boy paradise.

9.title: Battle for the Best in the World
9.plot: The entire family battles each other at the Trijicon Shooting Challenge, a true all-around competition with a $50,000 prize, to determine who really is the best shooter in the world.

imdb.plot outline: An atypical southern family of world-champion competitive shooters and custom gun manufacturers take on their own family members and the world from the Louisiana compound where they live. As well as building the coolest guns, they can shoot them faster than just about anybody. See what happens when challenges mount and generations collide on Shootout Lane.
imdb.title: Shootout Lane
plot: An atypical southern family of world-champion competitive shooters and custom gun manufacturers take on their own family members and the world from the Louisiana compound where they live. As well as building the coolest guns, they can shoot them faster than just about anybody. See what happens when challenges mount and generations collide on _Shootout Lane_ (qv).
